children.text:
Code structure:

  program combined
      implicit none
      double precision :: VP, VD, T, F, C
      double precision :: start, x
      integer :: ans1, final_result

      ! Read the five numbers
      read(*,*) VP, VD, T, F, C

      ! First program logic
      if (VD <= VP) then
          ans1 = 0
      else
          ans1 = 0
          start = T
          do
              x = start * VP / (VD - VP)
              ! Condition: (start + x) * VP >= C -> break
              if ((start + x) * VP >= C) then
                  exit
              end if
              ans1 = ans1 + 1
              start = start + 2*x + F
          end do
      end if

      ! Now, the second program logic: if (ans1 == 1) then
          final_result = 0
      else
          final_result = 1
      end if

      !
children.label: code_analysis

  end program combined

  program combined
      implicit none
      double precision :: VP, VD, T, F, C
      double precision :: start, x
      integer :: ans1, final_result

      read(*,*) VP, VD, T, F, C

      if (VD <= VP) then
          ans1 = 0
      else
          ans1 = 0
          start = T
          do
              x = start * VP / (VD - VP)
              if ((start + x) * VP >= C) exit
              ans1 = ans1 + 1
              start = start + 2*x + F
          end do
      end if

      if (ans1 == 1) then
          final_result = 0
      else
          final_result = 1
      end if

      print '(I0)', final_result

  end program combined

But note: the second program is designed to take one integer as input and output either 0 or 1.

So the complete code:

  program combined
      implicit none
      double precision :: VP, VD, T, F, C
      double precision :: start, x
      integer :: ans1, final_result

      read(*,*) VP, VD, T, F, C

      if (VD <= VP) then
          ans1 = 0
      else
          ans1 = 0
          start = T
          do
              x = start * VP / (VD - VP)
              if ((start + x) * VP >= C) exit
              ans1 = ans1 + 1
              start = start + 2*x + F
          end do
      end if

      if (ans1 == 1) then
          final_result = 0
      else
          final_result = 1
      end if

      print '(I0)', final_result

  end program combined
